content:
We've released 0.9.1 of cargo-component that should eliminate the failure relating to formatting of the bindings source code.

The pre-built binaries are in the process of being published for those cargo-binstall users out there.

Release v0.9.1 · bytecodealliance/cargo-component
Issues fixed This release contains a fix introduced in wit-bindgen 0.21.0 to eliminate trailing whitespace that was causing the automatic formatting of the generated bindings to fail. Users that ap...
